title: Error 500 on every NA forum page?
body: There is a LOT of LoL info around the web, but most of it (according to Google) is from the NA server, but whenever I try to connect to the NA forum to fix issues, figure out problems, get more info etc. I get "Error 500". Aside from resetting everything and rebooting my PC (standard crap), could it be an issue on my end, or with the servers?

replies.body: Possibly the servers. A lot of NA players are currently unable to access the store, or are just getting unexplained lag in game. I suggest waiting it out for a bit and then trying again.
